title: Top 10 American Serial Killers: Inside the Minds of Psychopaths
description: Where do they come from? How did they commit their crimes without remorse? A frightening journey into the sickening lives and deeds of America's most prolific serial killers. From early life to their lurid crimes and ultimate fates, 10 of America's most well known serial killers are covered in this short book to inform and intrigue the reader.
author: Sybil Jensen
